mapper.sql: CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, IMGAGES_PATH, EDITOR, DT, STU_NMB, ISPASS
mapper.select:
select
from event ORDER BY DT DESC
mapper.insert: insert into event (CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, IMGAGES_PATH, EDITOR, DT, STU_NMB, ISPASS) values (#{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgagesPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stuNmb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ispass,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update event
